work_experience.title: Senior Data Scientist
achievements: Led a team of 5 in developing NLP models to detect financial fraud from customer communication data.
Deployed end-to-end machine learning pipelines using AWS SageMaker and Docker.
Reduced false positives in fraud detection by 17% through improved feature engineering.

work_experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
achievements: Built deep learning models in PyTorch for customer churn prediction and image classification.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment using GitHub Actions and Kubernetes.
Collaborated with data engineering team to optimize ETL pipelines with Apache Spark.

work_experience.title: Data Scientist
achievements: Developed predictive models using scikit-learn and gradient boosting for marketing analytics.
Created interactive dashboards in Tableau to visualize customer engagement metrics.
Mentored two junior analysts on Python and statistical modeling techniques.
